Name: The Typing of The Dead: Overkill
About the game: Typing of the dead: Overkill fuses the horror and comedy of the legendary House of the Dead series with unique typing mechanics in order to deliver a truly original gaming experience! This gruesome shooter puts you in the middle of a mutant outbreak in Bayou county. Blast pieces out of the zombie horde across 9 stages, one keystroke at a time, in order to save you and a friends life as you work to uncover the mystery behind the outbreak. Features: - Randomised kill-words to make every game experience unique; - Your keyboard is the weapon – type bullet holes into those zombie hordes! - Three difficulty levels included to test your typing skills to the max as well as a special ‘hardcore’ level for true keyboard warriors! - Redefined HOTD gameplay to complement the new typing mechanics; - Two-Player co-op multiplayer - Full Steam integration - Full and faithful port of the original PS3 edition of HOTD included in game - Plus more to come
